subject: Re: NHK Taiga TV Series
msgSnippet: Japan uses the same VCR tapes as N. America (i.e. not PAL format), but the DVDs are another region.  You could buy a region free DVD player that plays DVDs

Japan uses the same VCR tapes as N. America (i.e. not PAL format), 
but the=
 DVDs are another region.  You could buy a 'region free' DVD 
player that p=
lays DVDs from anywhere.  I have one and it works 
great.  I don't believe =
there are any Taiga drama available outside 
Japan.  I've called various Ja=
panese language stations in the past, 
and they all say NHK holds the right=
s, so they can't sell them.  
Otherwise your only bet is to find someone wh=
o actually has them who 
would be willing to record them for you.
